dt: {bc}disagreeing especially with an established religious or political system, organization, or belief

et: Latin {it}dissident-, dissidens{/it}, present participle of {it}dissidēre{/it} to sit apart, disagree, from {it}dis-{/it} + {it}sedēre{/it} to sit {ma}{mat|sit|}{/ma}
shortdef: disagreeing especially with an established religious or political system, organization, or belief
